name: Click Me (Huw Miller)
description:
Click Me is a short game made by Huw Miller in under two hours. Please don't expect anything great with this game.

Click Me is about a person who installs a piece of "software" onto their computer titled Click Me. As the player progresses, they will find the game requires specific answers to certain questions and may result in frustration. That's the way this game was designed. Play at your own risk.

The real reason this game was made was because Huw wanted to try using a different game engine than usual and give it an older "classic PC" look.
